title: Data associated with the Veale Wasbrough Vizards LLP report commissioned by SCC regarding legal Undertakings illegitimately pursued in 2017 relating to the council's Street Tree felling programme.

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
This is an Freedom of Information request.
Please provide the brief / terms of reference or similar, pertaining to the engaging of Veale Wasbrough Vizards LLP to review and report on the matter of complaints against the council concerning the threat of legal action issued by SCC (whilst demonstrably failing in its duty of candour) with the intention of precipitating the signing of legally binding Undertakings by recipients, associated with campaigning against the unnecessary felling of street trees in Sheffield.
Please also provide the entire report Veale Wasbrough Vizards LLP has delivered at the cost of £118,506 to the residents of Sheffield, with absolutely minimal redaction.
Many thanks with regards
Mr. Buxton

Dear Mr Buxton,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Veale Wasbrough
Vizards LLP report which we received on 22/04/2025.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 21/05/2025. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Please note that from 1^st January 2025, as part of our commitment to
improving services, the council will accept FOI requests via the online
